recipeList.directions: 1. Heat oil in a large skillet over medium heat. 2. Add potatoes and cook for 5 minutes, stirring occasionally. 3. Add diced broccoli and cook for an additional 5 minutes. 4. Push potato and broccoli to one side of the skillet. 5. Add ground beef into the empty side of the skillet. Cook until browned about 6-8 minutes. 6. Once beef is cooked, stir it into the potatoes and broccoli. 7. Sprinkle garlic powder, onion powder, oregano, pepper and salt over the top. Stir to combine. 8. Reduce to a simmer and cook for about 8-10 minutes or until potatoes are cooked through.
recipeList.ingredients: 2 potatoes (diced), 1 cup broccoli (diced), 1 pound ground beef, 2 tablespoons vegetable oil, 1/4 teaspoon garlic powder, 1/4 teaspoon onion powder, 1/2 teaspoon oregano, 1/4 teaspoon black pepper, Salt to taste
